name: Wipe out opponent's entire LP (from the amount the duel started with) in a single turn
Beat Keith in a Free Duel
Boost a card to max ATK or max DEF
Win a mage duel with a deck that only has monsters in it
Use a spell that heals or damages LP
Have your monster field loaded with Winged Beast type cards
Win a duel with a deck with only Dinosaur-type monsters in it
Don't win against Duel Master K
500 or more total cards in chest
Beat Villager 2 in a Free Duel
Control 3 copies of the same monster with different attack values
Win a duel after the field has been every field type
